features.1: Added an end of experiment view that summarizes the results

bugfixes.1: Restarting a run now properly clears ports
bugfixes.2: Ignored initial 0.2 MHz spike on signal check plot

other.1: Number of readers options increased to 12

features.1: Updates to guided setup form to use equilibration time and dropdowns
features.2: Updates to plotting/analysis to use an equilibration period
features.3: Updates to SGI to use percentage based shift
features.5: Removed feature where inoculation set the SGI zero point
features.6: Added a confirmation dialog to stop button and renamed it

bugfixes.1: Analyzed files now correlate 1:1 with on screen plots

other.1: Spline and signal strength have been removed from codebase.
other.2: Logger max size reduced to 10 kb
other.3: Reduced the number of analyzed files generated

features.1: SIB control v2.2.0 and related error handling implementation

bugfix.1: Updated settings to max frequency of 170 MHz
bugfix.2: Fixed an issue with calibration using start frequency only.

features.1: Updated defaults values for scan rate, stop frequency and start frequency

features.2: Implemented gaussian fit to data with a window around the peak
features.3: Added back firmware version check for v2.3.1
features.4: Removed start/stop frequency checks from SIB

bugfixes.1: Fixed issue with SIB not scanning
bugfixes.2: Fixed issue with one failed scan crashing summary pdf/csv

features.1: Added number of points to menubar
features.2: Increased number of points for SIB scans

features.1: Added functionality to account for folders in software-update folder.

bugfixes.1: Fixed VNA scan errors and dependency on threadpoolctl.
bugfixes.2: Fixed errors causing SIB to go into an infinite error loop on failure to check scan status.

Other.1: Released as an R&D version only.

features.1: Updated logging to reduce entries created, and timestamp them.

bugfixes.2: Moved guided setup form to be on top of desktop app.
bugfixes.3: Updated software update algorithm to find most recent version only.

other.1: Fixed dev mode to work with new reader interfaces.

bugfixes.1: Updated release notes to sort and display most recent first

other.1: Updated sib integration with sleep/wake, disabled firmware version check.
other.2: Added gnome-screenshot to dependencies for asus lapop

features.1: Added simultaneous calibration, after connecting readers

features.2: Added a cleanup process for data/log files older than a month

bugfixes.1: Fixed an issue with the ssh connection failing and crashing on asus laptops
Fixed a bug causing release notes dialog to format improperly
